description.@en: With but a prick of the needle, you can render another dazed.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, one foe suffers [[/roll 1D10]]+[WB] in physical Peril.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above and the foe is unable to Counterspell, Dodge or Parry on their next Turn.

criticalFailure.@en: Your body is wracked with pain, lightning lancing through your bones. You suffer [[/roll 1D10]]+[WB] in physical Peril.

system.distance: Any one person you can touch
